title: Kan Çiçekleri
overview: The story of Dilan, whose dreams and hopes were taken from her on one hand, and Baran, who had to marry on the other to end the feud and save her brother from this cycle. However, this marriage is a prison for the two of them, and his uncle, who is eyeing his wealth, wants to rekindle the feud. This conflict-filled relationship will bring strong winds between two hearts; Will this marriage turn into a real marriage?
